comment: /** * Returns the object or null if the given key does not have a * value in the context */
code: /** * Returns the object or null if the given key does not have a * value in the context */ // (T)object @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") public T getFromContext(String key) { return context != null ? (T) context.get(key) : null. }

comment: /**  * Puts the object into the context  */
code: /**  * Puts the object into the context  */ public void putInContext(String key, Object value) {     if (context == null) {         context = new HashMap<>().     }     context.put(key, value). }
